meanings.definition: A hormone secreted by the pituitary gland that stimulates the thyroid gland to produce thyroid hormones.
meanings.sent1: Thyrotropins help the thyroid gland make important hormones.
meanings.sent2: Doctors check thyrotropins to see how well the thyroid is working.
meanings.sent3: The thyrotropins in my body are like little messengers telling my thyroid to get to work!
meanings.sent4: Her thyrotropins were like a wake-up call for her thyroid, urging it to start producing hormones.
meanings.sent5: The role of thyrotropins is crucial in maintaining a healthy thyroid function.
